r.price_type
r.reg_date
r.reward_id
DESC
ASC
, r.reward_id DESC ) AS rnum FROM suho_reward r LEFT JOIN suho_goods g1 ON r.goods_1 = g1.goods_id LEFT JOIN suho_goods g2 ON r.goods_2 = g2.goods_id LEFT JOIN suho_goods g3 ON r.goods_3 = g3.goods_id LEFT JOIN suho_goods g4 ON r.goods_4 = g4.goods_id

) inner_query ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY rnum ASC
